website_summaries.verdict: While the motion tracking trails its PC VR counterparts, Sony's PlayStation VR otherwise crams a solid and satisfying virtual reality experience into an existing PS4 game console.
pros: The PlayStation VR is the most accessible, affordable and user-friendly full VR option on the market
Sony has promised support from a long list of developers down the track but the immediate launch games are pretty solid as well
cons: Its single-camera tracking system occasionally feels lacking and you may have trouble when you turn around
The PSVR's graphical fidelity is occasionally noticeably lower than what's possible with HTC Vive and Oculus Rift

customer_reviews.title: PS4 Camera not included.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review on anything I've purchased on amazon, and frankly I'm pretty disappointed with this purchase. I went out today and bought two controllers for it, because those also aren't included. I wasn't too upset about that, but the fact that it doesn't warn you that the camera is REQUIRED TO USE this product baffles me. So I've spent a significant amount more money than what I thought I was going to with this purchase. It'll be my first return through Amazon as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Thieringer

customer_reviews.title: Used product gutted before resale.
customer_reviews.text: The product was used, and looked fine out of the box, but after inspection the cooling fan was removed from the processor unit. The machine now overheats after a few minutes of play, rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Own this and the Vive. Like the video quality, text is easy to read. Things like this makes me excited about technology and hungry for more. Absolutely amazing. It is so much fun. I am looking forward to more games for it.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Good set, everything works
customer_reviews.text: Good set, everything works. Good buyer. Not as high quality as the Oculus rift or such, but I love mine. Just need more games for it. Buyers that want this must get the following games -red blood: until dawn(rollercoaster clown-shooting scary game) -farpoint (halo looking game with the PS gun: intense) -resident evil (very creepy) -VR drive club (for driver enthusiasts who love the speed and car swaying; very good game) All these games are cheap; $10-$15
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: You need a camera for this to work. This does not come with a camera. So your getting scammed out of your money. First thing I’m sending back. Too much money, guess I really don’t care for VR anymore...
customer_reviews.author: Britney Morris

customer_reviews.title: Bundle is not “ready to play”
customer_reviews.text: This “ready to play” bundle is, in fact, not “ready to play.” It requires a camera, which you have to purchase separately. Amazon and PlayStation obscure this fact (who knows why) so when you wait a week to get your VR and get halfway through setup, you the realize you don’t have everything you need to play. You then have to order a camera and wait another week. JUST INCLUDE THE CAMERA. I would happily have paid more for an actual “ready to play” bundle with the camera in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Coates

customer_reviews.title: It's just another gaming experience like Nintendo, Xbox
customer_reviews.text: I would say five when I first got it but I guess you get used to it. It's just another gaming experience like Nintendo, Xbox, Sega and any other console ever made that happens to be an add on with PlayStation. But a great add on it is and PlayStation is doing well also as far as video games. I give it a four, still great in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Mizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: This is a hit! Everyone who has played on this loves it. I get a little sick if there is too much movement, but no one else seems to have this problem. The kids play it with VR games and with regular games and enjoy both. The movement with the camera works well, we haven't had any trouble with using it. The environments are clear and the ability to look 360 degrees is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: The original price should be the "used" price
customer_reviews.text: Everything works perfectly. It's amazing being able to be inside different worlds. The only issues I have are: You can't comfortably use any over-head headphones while wearing it. I have solo beats and they're not that big. One of the lenses has a small scratch/chip. I can't tell it's there while wearing them but I know it's there so it bothers me a bit. Wearing these during summer in Cali is pretty bad. Sweaty forehead and the glasses fog up sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Very fun. No one will appreciate the immersion this brings ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fun. No one will appreciate the immersion this brings you without actually putting a VR headset on. Videos, reviews, nothing will make you realize the wonder until you try it. It’s totally insane. Only thing I wish for is higher resolution. But apparently the PS4 couldn’t handle it anyways. But I’m definitely buying the second version for the PS5 if it’s ever released!
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant At first to buy just the headset ( Ipreviously bought the camera and controllers used elsewhere to save money) because it seemed to good to be true for the price I paid for, but I’m SO glad I did!!!! Fresh out of the box, it came with a bunch of cords with directions on what to do with the cords (they were numbered to help the non tech people like myself) headphones and a micro cloth for the lenses!! I’m in love with my PSVR !!!!
customer_reviews.author: maria wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: Do your research before buying.
customer_reviews.text: The VR headset for the PS4 is good a investment for someone to ease into virtual reality. The only down side is that you have to buy the motion camera and Move controllers seperately from the headset, and while it is the cheapest option compared to the occulus it is still comes to around 400 dollars not including the seperate purchase of camera and move controllers. Also make sure you know which vr games require the move controlers becaues those games wont start until you have them.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Oberst

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love VR. Hope Sony keeps it coming for years to come. This is the future.
customer_reviews.author: CAADet

customer_reviews.title: Xbox Red Ring of Death all over again!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the PSVR for less than 2 years and it has stopped working twice. It just stops working and a red light flashes an error code (five flashes=overheated). If it overheats sitting on top of the entertainment center, clear of any obstructions, it's a piece of C%#p. Xbox 360 had the same problem. It would overheat, stop working and flash, the now infamous, Red Ring of Death. Eventually, Microsoft began giving away replacement units to anyone who reported receiving the above mentioned red ring. Sony wants $99. to repair (replace) the unit AGAIN. I moved to the Oculus Quest VR. I won't be buying the PS5. Sorry Playstation fans. OneToTheHeadz
customer_reviews.author: william lennon

customer_reviews.title: A great VR product!
customer_reviews.text: PSVR is fantastic. Rez Infinite and Bound are worth buying the system for alone. I also own Oculus Rift w/ Touch, and that is really great too, but even compared with that, PSVR is solid. If you want to see advancements in VR, support these efforts! For a first gen product (which was a little bit of a surprise, when it was first shown off) it really is quite well executed. Can't wait to see what content comes out for it in 2017! Lots more please!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Gold

customer_reviews.title: I mean....
customer_reviews.text: I mean... VR has come a long ways since Virtual Boy burned my eyes out of my skull so Thanks!! =) Very fun VR and one of the cheaper good ones on the market for everything it provides. Setup was straight forward and intuitive and more and more support is happening for this babe every day. If you're into VR and own a ps4 I'd highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SoleCipher

customer_reviews.title: Visual effect amazing, some flaws.
customer_reviews.text: The effect is absolutely amazing. But the lenses scratch very easily. Be sure to pick up lens protectors. Also, if you play a game with your ps4 headphones, there's no wireless support, so if you are really moving around alot, the jack can get disconnected. Very annoying. Also needs some more high quality games. Hopefully in the future we will have more.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Albers

customer_reviews.title: Factory refurbished is like brand new . Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: OMG . If you are one of those people that just needs a new replacement headset and processor, this is perfect . It is version 1 , but there is absolutely nothing wrong with it . Just make sure it is a factory refurbished product. The one I received looks and functions like brand new . No scratches on the lenses , and no sign it was even used . I am really glad I pulled the trigger on this because I didn't need a camera or any of the other stuff that comes in a bundle . Now I'm back to playing VR . Yay !!
customer_reviews.author: Chuckster

customer_reviews.title: Older model, but works well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit (processor and headset only) to replace the processor from a Skyrim VR bundle that was damaged in an electrical storm. Even though it was purchased a year after the bundle, the processor and headset are the old version (CUH-ZVR1). So if buying, be aware that it is not the current model.
customer_reviews.author: Octoberist

customer_reviews.title: It could obviously be better, but for the price point I think this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is first generation VR. It has decent games and decent implementation. It could obviously be better, but for the price point I think this is as good as it can be. Second generation will be coming within several years, when the image technology is available. Hey, the scary game is scary enough, and the VR really brings the game to life.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson Ng

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: When i recieved head piece, i thought it was me, that it wouldent work, i end up asking family to help. Come to find out it was defective, meaning wouldn't even come on.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: It's fun and does what it says but the games so ...
customer_reviews.text: It's fun and does what it says but the games so far are very short and they do get old fast.
customer_reviews.author: Chalcey

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have ever made when it comes to gaming. It can be very expensive if you don't already have a PS4 and a camera but it would still be worth saving up for. I have played almost all of the demo games and the graphics are amazing on most of them. The VR World's is a must buy for the underwater dive, felt like I was really there. Another bonus is that all games and even Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon videos work on the VR (not in 3d but it's like you're in an IMAX theatre). Definitely a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got this unit because it was cheaper than the bundle. But the unit came loose in a box and smelled terrible. When you think about the price difference between this refurbished unit and the bundle, do yourself a favor and just buy the bundle. I returned it the same day and purchased the Iron man bundle.
customer_reviews.author: A. Leon

customer_reviews.title: Premature!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive. Not quite ready. Not enough games, but you can use the PS4/Pro and VR with any game. The cable on that head set is loose and loses connection sometimes. No HDR pass through so I you want to enjoy HDR on the PS4 Pro you have to disconnect the unit. Can't get hot while wearing the unit then the screen fogs up. Fun? YES! Well thought out? NO!
customer_reviews.author: Seal Seven

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and feels real just have to remind yourself that ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow the world of VR, Amazing and feels real just have to remind yourself that it is not mind over matter. Lots of fun and see our world in whole new world. I wish it was wireless but I can live with it. It is hard wire to Play Station 4.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great fun system I can already tell me and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Was received the next day. Great fun system I can already tell me and my family will enjoy its features. It is a little fuzzy but it is very exciting to see what is in store for the future. It will only get better.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Able

customer_reviews.title: Not explanatory
customer_reviews.text: Apparently you need two other systems to make this work. Not indicated when buying. Bought this as a gift for someone in my family just to find out it can’t be used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not has intended
customer_reviews.text: Not as intended and deducted $100 off when returned the same day. Will need to purchase supplemental pieces at a substantial expense. Not useable alone.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Munecas

customer_reviews.title: Glasses not an issue
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, responsive, works with your glasses (required if prescription), doesn't give that seasick feeling (mostly). Okay, so the seasick thing kicks in at about 5-6 hours playtime, may differ for you. Initial setup takes a little figuring, but the only thing that might really confuse you comes with stickers clarifying everything. Over all good buy.
customer_reviews.author: kristopher reed

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a little over a month and the whole family loves it. I got it for my husband for Christmas and he really has enjoyed playing it. He is not a gamer type at all but thought that it would be fun and had enjoyed it as something to do in the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley E.

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS ON MY PC!! WHAAAAAAT!?
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset just for fun's sake to see if i could get it to work with SteamVR. Lo and behold it does!! Oodles of fun on PC and PS4.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, could be better
customer_reviews.text: This is a great VR headset for an entry point. It could use some work with the fact that it uses the move controllers and then you have a sight restriction if you turn around. The entire setup with the console could use some further development.
customer_reviews.author: T. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: no replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: can't buy replacement parts😡, $100 service + shipping. Screen door effect, screen wanders off and needs constant reset, low quality picture
customer_reviews.author: Water Sparx

customer_reviews.title: I was waiting to test this item by myself and is even better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Having tried other VR options, I was waiting to test this item by myself and is even better than expected.. just be careful to not get the visor to close to your glasses as the friction between the PSVR lens and the Glasses may scratch both. Regarding the move controllers.. O got mine second hand for $15.00 each.. not willing to pay almost $100.00 bucks for those and they worked flawlessly.. I haven't had issues with tracking and the tracking is 1 to 1.. the DS4 in the other hand tends to drift away and the positioning is not accurately represented in the VR world..
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Caderon

customer_reviews.title: Great immersion, needs more AAA support.
customer_reviews.text: The immersion is awesome, especially in RE7. I just wish it was capable of higher resolution than it currently is. Also needs better games. More AAA games like RE7. Has enough gimmick games already, like Until Dawn...
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: WoW VR is so wonderful! I am so glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Bogtrance

customer_reviews.title: Fun to Play But
customer_reviews.text: Still have fun playing this though still pricy. I’m just upset it didn’t come with the camera, I already knew I was going to have to pay for the motion controllers but no camera just a shame.

customer_reviews.title: Good seller, arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 4 stars because, I was under the impression we could just hook it up and play. The camera IS NEEDED, and did not come in this pack. That's really my fault, need to do more research. It does say a starter kit.... Anyway, good seller, arrived on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I got this Like New for so cheap. It’s amazing and we can’t play it enough. $188 for constant entertainment for 5 people in our house. Great product, we are so satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Madi Holthouse

customer_reviews.title: I love the VR
customer_reviews.text: I love the VR. It has so much potential still to go. I was very impressed as to how far it has already come. I like Farpoint and Resident Evil the most so far. Even the VR playroom game that Sony gives you with the VR is very cool and shows off how cool VR can be.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy McGarvey

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. I can't wait to see what type of games and the functionality that will come by using this technology. Try it out before you buy, but if you buy, you shouldn't be disappointed. The games that launched with the release of the VR headset are very diverse, giving any type of player several options to find their kind of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Southlake

customer_reviews.title: Came in perfevt condition with everything!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I purchased this item for a wonderful price, in a used condition, marked as good. When it showed up it was all original in the box! Wasn't even touched. Not a single scratch and came with every single cord still tied up and wrapped in plastic. BEST EXPERIENCE EVER. thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Laif Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing experience. I have had limited issues with tracking
customer_reviews.text: Amazing experience. I have had limited issues with tracking. Works great most of the time. You have to sit closer than you would expect, about 5 feet away. I compare it to how I was amazed when the original Wii came out and what it could do. However, this is 10 times more impressive. Must have experience.
customer_reviews.author: JJR

customer_reviews.title: Graphic quality is slightly less with the goggles
customer_reviews.text: The VR goggles are fantastic - motion capture while you wear the goggles, and a good set of earphones and you really feel like you are in the game environment. Looking forward to a few car racing (especially something like Dirt 4), Star Wars and combat flight simulator games.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin F Hanke

customer_reviews.title: I GOT TO GO IM IN VR WORLD.
customer_reviews.text: NOW THISIS THE FUTURE IN GAMING. ITS GOT TO BE THE MOST SCARY FUN AND ADDICTING GAME ADD ON I EVER USED. I HAVE TO FIGHT TO HAVE MY TURN. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: spirit lifter

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: The following was purchased for my son in June and now it's not working! How would I get a refund on the following ?
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a second set for my son as he liked using my VR. So now we own two!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: After exactly 3 months of purchasing this headset the knob on the headband stopped working and now the headset won't fit tightly. After spending that much money on something you would expect it to last more than three months.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hunt

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest product I may have ever purchased! Great quality! This device is built to last, extremely entertaining, and the whole family loves it!

customer_reviews.title: IT’S INCREDIBLE .....BUT!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome , if you aren’t prone to motion sickness . Reall does feel like you are in the game world . Sony just needs to release more content for it .
customer_reviews.author: warren turok

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: What can you say. I love it...This was exactly what my system was missing. If you already own a PS4 camera and move controllers. Than this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rysted

customer_reviews.title: Too costly for not much product.
customer_reviews.text: Low resolution, slow refresh rates, sadly a letdown. And an expensive one at that. Don't buy this wait for the better AR/VR systems to become "universal".
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Worked beautiful , don’t trust 3rd party sellers , they are deceiving

customer_reviews.title: and there really isn't a lot of great content for this yet
customer_reviews.text: The headset is very uncomfortable, constantly needs adjustment and the lenses fog up. That, and there really isn't a lot of great content for this yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Jackson

customer_reviews.title: The Sony PlayStation VR is still the best VR we've used or tried
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for over a year. Works extremely well. The Sony PlayStation VR is still the best VR we've used or tried!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase. Saved me a lot of money!
customer_reviews.text: I love how friendly the note on the receipt was. All equipment was in brand new condition and works great. I actually wasn't expecting the camera to be in this package too but it was!!! Well worth the money! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Waters

customer_reviews.title: so fun
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this however should have made wireless be careful for longevity due to wire stepped on often and box sits right at feet should have moved connection box either 1 foot up wire or three feet back to avoid this

customer_reviews.title: Giant leap for the entertainment of human kind
customer_reviews.text: This is just beyond "gaming"as we call it, new Era in entertainment for us all, incredible gadget, I absolutely love it... little advice, make sure you have extra hdmi cables, the ones provided by sony, are not good as usual...
customer_reviews.author: blu jag

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it; cannot put it down; if you’re reading this Joanna, send for help.
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah

customer_reviews.title: Total immersion
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of fun. Motion sickness was minimal for me, and passed after about a week or two of light play. Do yourself a favor and pick up Eagle Flight with this. The experience is surreal, and very enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: DrStTee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s like I’m really there. Playing Resident Evil 7 on this is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: BRYCE

customer_reviews.title: Great VR headset
customer_reviews.text: This is the best VR system on the market. The games are good but the future is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Kids absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My kids are crazy about this feature so my mission is accomplished...
customer_reviews.author: El Hadji Beye

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with Product. Cost of Accessories Not Included Adds Up.
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with Product. Cost of Accessories Not Included Adds Up.
customer_reviews.author: Sensei Rhee

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The VR work excellent, the experience is amazing. All items in box and the delivery was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: When I bought the headset it was a bit dirty, but It was nothing that couldnt be cleaned. This is what I was expecting, as i bought it used. But, the headset was in great condition and even came in the original box with the instructions and everything. In my mind, this was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryuuuuuuuji

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a birthday present for my son and it was just what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: VR is cool, but you can also use as a personal media player.
customer_reviews.text: I was a hardcore skeptic of PSVR, but after playing London Heist in Playstation VR Worlds, Eve Valkyrie, and X-wing in Star Wars Battleground I'm completely sold on the PSVR. Even if VR doesn't pick up, you can always use this as a personal video viewer. The common complaint is fidelity of 'cinema mode', but unless you are super nit-picky, it looks fine to me. It's nice to be able to play video games while my wife sleeps without disturbing her.
customer_reviews.author: Zsoldier

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations for this. I wanted it, but didn't expect it to be so good! I have vision problems and I still think this is truly an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: ausse777

customer_reviews.title: item came damaged
customer_reviews.text: i couldnt focus my view because VR lenses were badly scratched up, had to return
customer_reviews.author: amb bee

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret to buy it
customer_reviews.text: A different experience you should try it, Amazon as always excellent service thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro Mercado

customer_reviews.title: So much fun to use and to be in a game as ...
customer_reviews.text: So much fun to use and to be in a game as if your part of the world(game). I recommend this product for everyone that wants to experience games in a new way.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nice

customer_reviews.title: it is awesome amazing.
customer_reviews.text: i wanted one win it ever sense it came out. and after my big bro let me try his out . it is awesome amazing.
customer_reviews.author: TheDarkKnight

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly appreciate vr which you wouldn’t sweat so much using it aside fr that awesome experience!

customer_reviews.title: Buy it . It's worth every penny !
customer_reviews.text: The blur was bad at first and the tracking can be off , but it cleared up after a few uses . Also I cleaned the lens with a lenspen and wiped the headset clean overall . Modifying the VR settings will enhance overall experience . I'm currently playing on PS4 launch console and the resolution REALLY isn't as bad as everyone is making it . It's really something you have to experience !
customer_reviews.author: Afro Gemini

customer_reviews.title: Great product great service
customer_reviews.text: Was told no operation system or anything just the headset well I got a set of nunchucks the headset the operator system and all the cords for it was very impressed with the product looks smells brand new 5stars all day thank you all

customer_reviews.title: PLAYSTATION VR WOW
customer_reviews.text: Son was amazed by the vr said it was awesome, that's good enough for me he keeps saying that's awesome !!

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun for kids and adults my mom got off balance ...
customer_reviews.text: lots of fun for kids and adults my mom got off balance and almost fell on my 80 year old neighbor!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: DIDNT LAST LONG
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son last Christmas and it has already stopped working. Turns on fine but as soon as you touch the headset the system shuts down. The VR itself is very cool. Just wish the construction had been better.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Brock

customer_reviews.title: Took time to adjust googles for eyes
customer_reviews.text: Love the VR, only thing that I don't like is that it isn't easy to adjust the google part for the eyes.

customer_reviews.title: Careful what you buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept and the direction VR gaming is going. My only issue was I didn't pay attention and got the older version plus it was used. But I love the experience and cant wait until they improve on this tech.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. It is so much fun. I am looking forward to more games for it.

customer_reviews.text: I bought what I thought was a new VR set up for my daughter. What arrived at my house was a dirty, used VR set up and was still missing the earbuds. Upon making contact nothing was resolved or replaced. Will not use again.
customer_reviews.author: Wooden Spoon

customer_reviews.title: If you can afford it,  absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Rez Infinite and Thumper make this system spectacular from day one. I wear pretty bulky glasses and have zero issue. It is super comfortable. For the price Sony has done very well. Looking forward to Eagle Flight and Star Trek.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as a pcvr. If i haf an extra 1k i would buy a pc
customer_reviews.text: Need better contollers and a lower price to compare to pc vr

customer_reviews.text: They charge to much and do not tell you that you still need to purchase the camera and hand held wands.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: fun to use but there isn't a lot of software available for it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gross

customer_reviews.title: Support PSVR
customer_reviews.text: Loving it, no need to rehash what everyone has posted previously. Hoping to see full fledged games releasing on PSVR in the future. I can't wait to see an open world RPG in VR. Update: Been playing PSVR with the family for a week and they like it. I'm hoping Sony will make the eye distance calibration more user friendly by saving previous user settings. Games are great and I suggest trying out Batman VR as this is the only game so far that showcase the graphical capability of PSVR. Next, try Rush of Blood and Here they lie, all good release games.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Broke a month after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought in July, a month later the cord from the headset out is shorted somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mel M

customer_reviews.title: VR
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. Bought for my son and I’m 50 yrs old and love it.
customer_reviews.author: John L Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My kiddo is having a blast with it. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin65721

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth it! Met my expectations and then some. The headset is very comfortable and the gameplay in the included demo disc is smooth. I bought Drive Club VR right away because I enjoyed the demo so much. If you are thinking about buying this - do it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler J. Croyle

customer_reviews.title: Play station VR does not come with everything I thought.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this VR came with everything included. After I received it I noticed it didn't and I still had to buy the camera for it. Needless to say I wasn't very happy because I had to wait then for the camera and I still haven't received the controllers that I also had to buy separately and I didn't know that either.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not everything you need to play.
customer_reviews.text: This specific product does not some with the PlayStation camera or PlayStation move controllers. The goggles are awesome but I figured that everything would come together.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son says it's amazing, he enjoys it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo B.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, and affordable
customer_reviews.text: The next evolution of gaming. I can't stop thinking about how almost every single genre is going to be improved substantially with VR. While PS VR is the shiniest of the bunch, it's without debate the most practical, comfortable, and affordable. Not to mention it's PC competitors are almost dead in the water due to pricing and severe lack of quality software. This means most VR developers have already, or will eventually, jump ship. It's already outsold both competitors combined and shows now signs of slowing. I've spent 10+ hours so far and it just keeps blowing me away. Sony is going to pioneer the greatest advancement in video game tech since analog sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Gamers HQ

customer_reviews.title: Head set was junk
customer_reviews.text: We got this vr headset and paid olmost $200.00 dollars for a piece of junk, it does not work, will never order used items on Amazon ever again so very dissspointed
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Rice

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product greatly. Playstation needs more content for this platform and look forward to additional content to be released.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like this item can believe Amazon have for a low price that work perfectly.

product_meta.title: Sony PlayStation VR
product_meta.description: Discover a new world of unexpected gaming experiences with PlayStation VR. Redefine your expectations of immersion in gaming with moments so intense your intuition takes over. Step into incredible virtual worlds and overcome new challenges in extraordinary ways. Greatness Awaits with PlayStation VR. Games Come First - With gamers in mind, PlayStation delivers a new world of unexpected gaming experiences through PlayStation VR. Play some of the most highly anticipated titles of 2016 on PS VR including an all-new Star Wars Battlefront gaming experience and games like PlayStation VR Worlds, Golem, and RIGS Mechanized Combat League. Just Plug and Play - Getting into PlayStation VR couldn't be easier. Just plug the PlayStation VR headset and your PlayStation Camera into your PlayStation 4 system. You're ready to go. Advanced VR Display - The feeling of 'being there' starts with what you see. Seamless visuals keep you connected to the virtual world through an expansive 5.7” OLED 1080p display running at up to 120 frames per second. 3D Audio Technology - 3D Audio with PlayStation VR means that you'll be able to pinpoint sounds above, below, and all around you. Instinctively turn your head to the source of a single footstep and be able to judge its distance, just as you would in real life. Industry Leading Design - The PlayStation VR headset was engineered to be balanced, comfortable, and completely adjustable. It's designed to feel like it's not there - keeping you free from distraction as you explore new gaming worlds. Move With Purpose - The LEDs around the PlayStation VR headset, on the DUALSHOCK 4 wireless controller, and the PlayStation Move motion controller are tracked by the PlayStation Camera, providing an incredibly precise capture of your natural movement in virtual space. PlayStation 4 and Camera sold separately
feature_bullets: Contains: PlayStation VR headset, Processor unit, PlayStation VR headset connection cable, HDMI cable, USB cable, Stereo headphones, AC power cord, AC adaptor, PlayStation VR Demo Disc
Games Come First - With gamers in mind, PlayStation delivers a new world of unexpected gaming experiences through PlayStation VR
